comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Sir Kenneth Berrill (1920-2009) just died this year: www.timesonline.co.uk/tol/comment/obituaries/article62351... After this photo, after graduating in 1941, Berrill served in WWII with the Royal Electrical and Mechanical Engineers. He studied economic history at Cambridge after the war, and was a lecturer in economics there from 1949-1969. In his later career he was an adviser to the British government on economic development.
